item.title: By: GOF
item.dc:creator: GOF
item.description: <p>Support group here for pre hols send off Those present: Mary Anne, Erica, your Mum and Dad + vodka. Must go, Dad wants his dinner! B-off</p>
item.content:encoded: Support group here for pre hols send off Those present: Mary Anne, Erica, your Mum and Dad + vodka. Must go, Dad wants his dinner! B-off

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>From the pictures it is easy to see why sailing is so important!! Hope you have come to terms with your lost day. We are off on Thursday - hopefully we will be able to keep up with you while we are away but if not will catch up when we get back</p>
item.content:encoded: From the pictures it is easy to see why sailing is so important!! Hope you have come to terms with your lost day. We are off on Thursday – hopefully we will be able to keep up with you while we are away but if not will catch up when we get back

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Hi Matthew - glad to hear that your short hop over the date line went well! I've been a busy media-bee this week - I had a 1,500 word article on defamation and the Internet published in Insurance Day and have today had a by-line and article in the Society for Computers and Law web journal on e-commerce regulatory compliance: <a href="http://www.scl.org/services/default.asp?t=nw&p=134&c=-9999&cID=1200000106&ctID=10" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.scl.org/services/default.asp?t=nw&p=134&c=-9999&cID=1200000106&ctID=10</a> It has been dead sunny here today and life is generally good! Enjoy this stage of your trip!</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi Matthew – glad to hear that your short hop over the date line went well! I’ve been a busy media-bee this week – I had a 1,500 word article on defamation and the Internet published in Insurance Day and have today had a by-line and article in the Society for Computers and Law web journal on e-commerce regulatory compliance: http://www.scl.org/services/default.asp?t=nw&p=134&c=-9999&cID=1200000106&ctID=10 It has been dead sunny here today and life is generally good! Enjoy this stage of your trip!
